title: Andrew Johnson National Historic Site: Education
body: Bring History to Life  Learn many ways to reach state and national curriculum standards and share the story of Andrew Johnson with your students. We encourage you to bring your students on a field trip, invite a park ranger to your classroom, or utilize curriculum materials to extend learning opportunities.  Each summer, professional development opportunities are offered to explore the history of this resource.                 Plan a Field Trip A variety of on-site and educational opportunities exist for all grade levels. Students will be on their feet moving with history! Read More        Rangers to Classrooms Find grade specific programs that a ranger can provide in your classroom. Read More        Andrew Johnson Lesson Plans Find Lesson Plans to engage your students, meet standards, and have fun as they learn about President Andrew Johnson and his times. Read More
